_comment: OpenAI API Pricing - Last Updated: November 2025
_note: Prices are per 1,000 tokens (input/output). Verify current prices at platform.openai.com/pricing
_source: Based on OpenAI official pricing as of November 2025

gpt-5._description: GPT-5 - Latest flagship model with 1M token context, multimodal (text/image/audio/video)

gpt-5-mini._description: GPT-5 Mini - Cost-effective GPT-5 variant, faster responses

gpt-5-nano._description: GPT-5 Nano - Most affordable GPT-5, ideal for simple tasks

gpt-4.5._description: GPT-4.5 - Advanced model between GPT-4 and GPT-5, released Feb 2025

gpt-4o-mini._description: GPT-4o Mini - Affordable and intelligent small model

o1-pro._description: o1 Pro - Premium reasoning model for complex queries, highest compute

o1-preview._description: o1 Preview - Advanced reasoning model for complex tasks

o1-mini._description: o1 Mini - Faster reasoning model, more affordable

o3._description: o3 - Versatile reasoning model for various applications

o3-mini._description: o3 Mini - Compact reasoning model, cost-effective

gpt-4-turbo._description: GPT-4 Turbo - Previous generation flagship, 128K context

gpt-3.5-turbo._description: GPT-3.5 Turbo - Fast and affordable, legacy model

text-embedding-3-small._description: Embedding V3 Small - Higher performance at lower cost, 1536 dimensions

text-embedding-3-large._description: Embedding V3 Large - Most capable embedding model, 3072 dimensions

text-embedding-ada-002._description: Embedding Ada v2 - Previous generation, 1536 dimensions
